APP Profiler Code Viewer

There are two ways to open the Code Viewer panel:

  1. Click on the name of a kernel in the first column of the APP Profiler Session panel.
  2. Select the View -> Other Windows -> APP Profiler Code Viewer menu item from the Visual Studio main menu bar.

For OpenCL™ kernels, this panel shows the generated ISA or IL code of the kernel. It also shows the CL source code of the kernel.

For DirectCompute kernels, this panel shows the DXASM code of the kernel.

Select different modes in the combo box at the top of the panel to switch between IL, ISA, and CL modes.
